publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3706 Mr Mark Ruskell: Reducing Congestion on the Forth Road Bridge—That the Parliament welcomes the establishment of the new car sharing website, www.travelshare.co.uk, which will help reduce congestion on the Forth Road Bridge by encouraging empty seats in single occupancy vehicles to be filled with commuters; congratulates the enterprise of the two Fife businessmen who have set up this scheme; further believes that improvements in integrated public transport can reduce congestion on the Forth Road Bridge, and calls on the Forth Estuary Transport Authority to spend significant amounts of the proposed £4 bridge toll on giving cross-Forth commuters a genuine range of alternatives to reduce dependence on car usage.
